name: Cascade (Alfredo Castaño)
description:
Cascade is a wave based top-down about protecting your eye from enemies.

As a sunglasses, you can deflect enemy attacks and carry your eye. Also you will be able to close the eye by clicking on it to avoid enemy lasers.

Controls:

WASD = Move arround the scene

Left Mouse: Shoot

Click the eye: Close the eye / Avoid enemy bullets

Click on the eye carrying it: Enemies don't shoot, screen fades to black

E: Enemies don't shoot, screen fades to black

Survive the waves before you get blind!
